original_text:
Now you are wrecked by the seas,
    in the depths of the waters;
your merchandise and all your crew in your midst
    have sunk with you.
korean_text: 네가 바다 깊은 데에서 파선한 때에 네 무역품과 네 승객이 다 빠졌음이여

sentences.original_text: Now you are wrecked by the seas,
in the depths of the waters;
your merchandise and all your crew in your midst
sentences.korean_translation: 네 가운데 있는 네 모든 상품과 선원들은
